message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's a great opportunity for you, and I'm confident it will be very valuable to your business. My initial offer is $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and allows for a good return on investment for you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $900,000 is still a bit lower than I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to come down to $950,000, but that's my final offer.  This product is truly unique and will be a huge asset to your business. Let's close this deal and make it happen!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $950,000, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925,000. I think this is a fair compromise that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your offer. However,  $925,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $937,500. This is a very fair price, considering the value this product will bring to your business.  Let's close this deal and make it work.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $937,500. I'm willing to go up to $930,000, but that's as high as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand your position and I appreciate your offer. However, $930,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down to $935,000. This is a very fair price, considering the value this product will bring to your business.  Let's try to find a common ground and make this deal happen.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $935,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $920,000. I think this is a fair compromise that works for both of us.
